plot: Two guys - one a swinging Londoner, the other a stud hick from West Virginia, come to L.A in 1975 to rule the town. Usually though it's the other way around.
title: Groovin' On
plot_es: Two guys - one a swinging Londoner, the other a stud hick from West Virginia, come to L.A in 1975 to rule the town. Usually though it's the other way around.
plot_en: Two guys - one a swinging Londoner, the other a stud hick from West Virginia, come to L.A in 1975 to rule the town. Usually though it's the other way around.
